Package com.norswap.nanoeth.trees.patricia

Class MerkleProofBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.norswap.nanoeth.trees.patricia.MerkleProofBuilder
public final class MerkleProofBuilder
extends Object
Used by PatriciaTree.prove(byte[]) and PatriciaNode.buildProof(Nibbles, MerkleProofBuilder) to build a MerkleProof.

For each node in the branch going from the root node to the leaf (all included), the add method corresponding to the type of node should called on this builder class.

      public void addEndBranchNode​(byte[] data, byte[][] digests)

    • addPathBranchNode

      public void addPathBranchNode​(byte[] data, byte pivot, byte[][] digests)
      Call this method for branch nodes where the value for the entry being proven is in one of the children of the nodes with index pivot (i.e. the value being proven is not data).

    • build

      public MerkleProof build()
      Builds and returns the proof, or returns null if there was no entry to prove.
